title: Shoushinmono Na Veteran Chuunen Boukensha To Dorei No Kitsunemimi Shoujo
alternative_title: 小心者なベテラン中年冒険者と奴隷の狐耳少女 ; Shoushin Mono na Veteran Chuunen Boukensha to Dorei no Kitsune Mimi Shoujo ; The Middle-Aged Adventurer & The Slave Girl ; A Timid Veteran Middle-Aged Adventurer and his Slave Fox-eared Girl
status: 小心者なベテラン中年冒険者と奴隷の狐耳少女 ; Shoushin Mono na Veteran Chuunen Boukensha to Dorei no Kitsune Mimi Shoujo ; The Middle-Aged Adventurer & The Slave Girl ; A Timid Veteran Middle-Aged Adventurer and his Slave Fox-eared Girl
description:
Description :
        Gino, an adventurer, has survived as an adventurer for more than 20 years since he left the countryside at the age of 15 thanks to his cautious personality. Gino, who had already reached the veteran level, had gained a certain position and wealth but knew that his appearance was not pleasant to women, so he retired as an adventurer to marry and build a family. He gave up the opportunity and decided to buy a sex slave with the property he had saved so far. Gino chose to continue his adventurer business tomorrow, but after the sex slave came home, Gino's life began to change little by little...

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: How To Handle Things
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Middle-Aged Adventurer And Slave.
